Sentencas: Nano-crystalline films of Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3 (SSC) have been formed on CeO2 substrates by spraying stoichiometric aqueous solution containing Sm, Sr, and Co ions.
Titulo: Effect of PVA addition on formation of spray-deposited Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3 thin films on CeO2 substrates

Sentencas: Effect of polyvinyl alcohol (PVA) addition as a complexing agent in spray solution on stoichiometry, crystallite size, morphology, and transport properties of film are studied.
Titulo: Effect of PVA addition on formation of spray-deposited Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3 thin films on CeO2 substrates

Sentencas: The results showed that the SSC cathode had maximum crystallite size for 40% PVA addition.
Titulo: Effect of PVA addition on formation of spray-deposited Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3 thin films on CeO2 substrates

Sentencas: Electrical performance of film decreases with decrease in the particle size, while the electronic to ionic predominance transition temperature decreases with decreasing particle size.
Titulo: Effect of PVA addition on formation of spray-deposited Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3 thin films on CeO2 substrates

Sentencas: These films are studied for their potential application as a cathodic material in developing intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Effect of PVA addition on formation of spray-deposited Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3 thin films on CeO2 substrates
